title: Arrm Electric
author: ''
date: '2022-10-25'
slug: arrm_electric
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.6M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Arrm Electric. The average
  contract duration was 0.28 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $83.3K. The longest
  contract was 1.19 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.9M.
lookup_name: 'ARRM ELECTRIC'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.6M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '44'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '7%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '27%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.33'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '593.7K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.28'
s421_mean_contract_value: '83.3K'
s425_max_duration: '1.19'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.9M'
---
